Description of Environmental Engineering

The Civil engineer must be aware of the environmental effects of pollutants and should be able to understand the pollutants, their characteristics and manage systems to mitigate them.

  • 1. Introduction
    45:00 Min
  • 2. Quality and Quantity of Water for supply to towns/Cities
    45:00 Min
  • 3. Characteristics of Wastewater
    45:00 Min
  • 4. House Drainage
    45:00 Min
  • 5. Solid Waste Management
    45:00 Min
  • 6. Air Pollution
    45:00 Min
  • 7. Noise Pollution
    45:00 Min
  • 8. Introduction to: “The environment (Protection)
    45:00 Min
